title: JP's GTAV singleplayer cheat menu
description:
This is the first version of my GTAV singleplayer cheat menu. 

Requierements : 

Script Hook V (http://www.dev-c.com/gtav/scripthookv/) 
GTALua 1.1.1 (http://www.gtalua.com/) 
(remove the GTALua folder you downloaded and take mine) 
VC++ Redist VS 2013 x64 (Optional) 

Install : 

- Install requierements 
- Delete the GTALua folder you downloaded from GTALua.com and take mine 
- Drag all the files into your GTA V directory. 

How to change the open key of the Mod : 

- Go into Grand Theft Auto VGTALuaaddonsOHMYMODZEssential4.0main.lua 
- Change "local openKey = KEY_F8" with KEY_F5 for example 

Controls : 

F8 Key :	Open the menu 
Numpad Key : 2,4,6,8	Navigate through options 
Numpad Key : 5 Select 
Numpad Key : 0 Go back 

GTA Online : 

Do not go in GTA Online with the Mod Menu. 

Multiplayer Co-op : 

You can now play on Multiplayer Co-op with the Mod Menu !  
https://www.gta5-mods.com/scripts/multiplayer-co-op

V-Multiplayer : 

You can now play on V-Multiplayer with the Mod Menu !  
https://www.gta5-mods.com/scripts/v-multiplayer
